events.name: The Antikythera Mechanism
events.description: An ancient Greek device considered the first computer.

generated_content.meta_description: Explore historical mysteries in Antikythera, Greece. Uncover the secrets of Antikythera, a ancient Greek island where the world's first mechanical calculator was discovered.
generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in Antikythera, Greece - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Uncover the secrets of Antikythera, a ancient Greek island where the world's first mechanical calculator was discovered. Explore the ruins of an ancient temple and museum to learn about this fascinating piece of history.
